Just a heads up. Heading to bed soon here so need to pause our semi-live game. :D
so difficult game...
The dynamics are just so different. Though I feel the private that gives a free cert is almost similar to -30s Camden&Amboy where you really shouldn't let it go too cheap.

I was afraid that my early second company would just end up eating some 3s and 4s and run out of money, but I was able to withhold for the trains while keeping up with the value of others. Also dipping the GCL to yellow was a lucky strike. :P So few trains to go around.
Also there was the option to buy the train from NBDS to pool the company money some, though that would've robbed you from one train run. Hard to know which one was better.
Also from my very small experience, Antwerp looks like an important token spot.
I was expecting Navor to go for the NBDS one SR earlier, which would've eaten my 3s, though this way I was able to rush out a D. I kinda feel it may have been a snowball from the beginning.
Ufff
But no bankrupcies. I guess that's an achievement too for a first game. xD
